title: Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company reports 183.9% rise in Q4 PAT - Business Standard
content: Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company reports 183.9% rise in Q4 PAT  Business Standard
description: Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company Ltd has reported a 183.9 per cent jump on its profit after tax for the quarter ending March 31, 2022 at Rs 690 crore, the company said on Friday.
